trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBFST041_00197_SEQ_00<tab>Maurelin, a Serpent at the Bannock, is seeking a volunteer to gather materials used in the training of recruits.
TEXT_SUBFST041_00197_SEQ_01<tab>Collect four shells from the giant, insect-like bog yarzons that dwell in the river to the south of the Bannock.
TEXT_SUBFST041_00197_SEQ_02<tab>You have collected the bog yarzon shells. Deliver them to Mariustel at the Bannock.

TEXT_SUBFST041_00197_SEQ_03<tab>Mariustel intends to use the shells you have brought him in the next round of training drills. Once the recruits have learned how best to dispatch a bog yarzon, maintaining a secure perimeter around the camp will seem a far less daunting task.
TEXT_SUBFST041_00197_TODO_00<tab>Slay bog yarzons and obtain their shells.
TEXT_SUBFST041_00197_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the bog yarzon shells to Mariustel at the Bannock.
TEXT_SUBFST041_00197_MAURELIN_000_1<tab>Ho there, adventurer. If it is work you seek, then look no further.
TEXT_SUBFST041_00197_MAURELIN_000_2<tab>Instructor Mariustel needs a volunteer to bring him some bog yarzon shells for the recruits to practice on.
TEXT_SUBFST041_00197_MAURELIN_000_3<tab>You'll find yarzons in the river south of here. Once you've pried the carapaces from four of the creatures, take them to the instructor.
TEXT_SUBFST041_00197_MARIUSTEL_000_11<tab>Hm? Not a new recruit? Then wh─ Ah, the yarzon shells I ordered Maurelin to requisition! I see he's learned to delegate authority if nothing else.

TEXT_SUBFST041_00197_MARIUSTEL_000_12<tab>Now that I have these carapaces, I can set my recruits some specialized drills. They are already adept at hitting a target, of course, but they need practical knowledge of exactly <var 1A 02 /var>where<var 1A 01 /var> a monster like the yarzon is most vulnerable.

TEXT_SUBFST041_00197_MARIUSTEL_000_13<tab>Thanks to your efforts, I've no doubt they will fare rather better against the creatures when called upon. You should be proud of yourself─both they and the Bannock are safer for your help.
